title: Border, 1750–75
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: A border of Point d'Argentan with asymmetrical floral sprays interspersed by oval openings and asymmetrical diagonally running ribbons. Fond: reséau bouclée; Modes: portes, gaze quadrillee, petit réseau, fond de neige, réseau mouché.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1750–75.
1750–75. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-48.
